_header: Luke in his lesson leres us thus / Unto his disciples…
_description: Gospel for the Second Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Luke in his lesson leres vs þusvnto his desciples said ihesus…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Als of þe sin of litcheryAls men may se here opinly
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Homo quidam fecit cenam magnam.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica ii post trinitatem Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 105ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.276-280.
